EmailTemplate.name: User Communication
EmailTemplate.subject: Summer is Here and Saleforce.com Summer 2013 is too
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Summer is quickly approaching and Saleforce.com will be releasing their Summer 2013 edition into our production the week of the Jun 16th. There will be some many new enhancements such has management of report folders for easier sharing, Chatter Answers and Saleforce Ideas, but most notably will be the production release of Chatter Communities which is backbone our Customer Portal that will launch in Q'4 2013.
More details about the release can be found at this url.
http://www.salesforce.com/customer-resources/releases/
With this production release looming, the regular enhancement that we have been supporting will be on hold until the new production has been released to our environment basic functions proven to be bug free. We estimate complete by June 21, 2013.
We do not anticipate any disruption of services to the user and hot fixes will still be supported for critical items.
If you have any questions, please let let us know.
King Ou
